Species.js File Reference

Detailed Description

Wednus Species class.

This class defines the species and is the abstract super class of the W.Creature

Author:
Sundew H. Shin

W Species

Initial value:

 function(args){
  this.id = 0;
  this.name = 'no name';
  this.species = 'unknown species';
  this.world = null;
  this.uwidth = 1;
  this.uheight = 1;
  this.udepth = 1;
  this.col = 0;
  this.row = 0;
  this.act = 'hide';
  this.dir = 'south';
  
  this.frame = 0;
  this.maxTop = 0;
  this.maxLeft = 0;
  
  this.speed = 6;

  
  for(var i in args)
    eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
}
